channel.title: How do I make npcs agressive?!?
channel.description: Please someone just tell me, I don't know how and I really need to know how to make npcs agressive. ++

item.title: How do I make npcs agressive?!?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

He doesn’t want the max hit…He wants it so the NPC attacks you first…

NPCHandler class.

search for

} else if (npcs[i].RandomWalk == false && npcs[i].IsUnderAttack == true) {

add the NPC ID to the list.

Scroll down a little bit and you will see 2 more lists similar to the first one, add the NPC ID to those also.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I make npcs agressive?!?

item.title: How do I make npcs agressive?!?
item.dc:creator: @kedonot1 kedonot1
item.description:
@kedonot1 wrote:

Search
hitDiff = misc
Then it says (number)
change that to w/e you want.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I make npcs agressive?!?

item.title: How do I make npcs agressive?!?
item.dc:creator: @a_d_i_o_n a d i o n
item.description:
@a_d_i_o_n wrote:

CripScape Jeff:

you can change his max hit by changing the “(84)”

thats not how you change the max hit btw

		if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 90) { 
			hitDiff = misc.random(2);

Change the (2) there to change the max hit

Read full topic
item.source: How do I make npcs agressive?!?

item.title: How do I make npcs agressive?!?
item.dc:creator: @CripScape_Jeff CripScape Jeff
item.description:
@CripScape_Jeff wrote:

ok go to npchandler.java and search for somthing like this

		if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2745) {
			rand_npc = misc.random(84);
		}

then add that if you want jad to be agressive when people attack him and you can change his max hit by changing the “(84)”

Read full topic
item.source: How do I make npcs agressive?!?
